text: Arthrostylidium pubescens is a species of Arthrostylidium bamboo in the grass family.Ruprecht, Franz Josef. 1839. Bambuseae 27.Ruprecht, Franz Josef. 1840. Mém. Acad. Imp. Sci. Saint-Pétersbourg, Sér. 6, Sci. Math., Seconde Pt. Sci. Nat. 3(2): 117 == Distribution == Arthrostylidium pubescens is native to Puerto Rico and Venezuela. == References == Category:Bamboo species
title: Arthrostylidium pubescens
